wikipedia_page.main: Henry Bromley Derry MVO DMus FRCO FLCM (1885 – 4 April 1954) was an organist and professor of Music based in England.

link_mentions.page: Church of the Holy Trinity, Stratford-upon-Avon
response: *Henry Bromley Derry, 1903–1908Dictionary of Organs and Organists. First Edition. 1912. p. 268. (later organist of All Saints Church, Ealing).

The current Master of the Music is Philip Berg (since 1995); the sub-organist is Justin Luke (since 2002). Previous Masters of the Music include Henry Bromley Derry (from  to 1954) and William Cole (from 1954 to 1994).
